mapper.select: select * from Loupan_Info where name like concat(concat('%',#{name}),'%')
mapper.insert: insert into Loupan_Info( name, subName, detailDesc, indexImgs, planImgs, effectImgs, supportImgs, modelImgs, layoutImgs, link, lng, lat, price, contactName, contactPhone, contactLandLine, contactWX, contactQQ, status, gmtOpen, gmtCreated ) values ( #{name}, #{subName}, #{detailDesc}, #{indexImgs}, #{planImgs}, #{effectImgs}, #{supportImgs}, #{modelImgs}, #{layoutImgs}, #{link}, #{lng}, #{lat}, #{price}, #{contactName}, #{contactPhone}, #{contactLandLine}, #{contactWX}, #{contactQQ}, #{status}, #{gmtOpen}, now() )
mapper.update: update Loupan_Info set indexImg=#{indexImg}, planImgs=#{planImgs}, effectImgs=#{effectImgs}, supportImgs=#{supportImgs}, modelImgs=#{modelImgs}, layoutImgs=#{layoutImgs} where id=#{id}
